name: 迷·局-新京医院
description:
This is a decryption game set in a campus and hospital. Players will take on the roles of their respective choices and enter into a foggy scripted killing, unlocking the organs and collecting and analyzing clues to unravel the truth behind the serial case thirty years ago step by step.

The game contains two lines, more than ten levels, multiple endings, a large number of brain-burning puzzles waiting for you to solve!
The game supports 1-4 players to play online, and the built-in voice helps you communicate with your partner smoothly!

If you encounter any problems during the game, welcome to join the official QQ group 612065641, there will be professional customer service staff to help you solve.
developers: JILIN JAI PANGU NETWORK SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY
publishers: JILIN JAI PANGU NETWORK SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY
